Title: A King's Ransom
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Hanna Nystrom, Andres Salaff, Kent Osborne (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Tom Herpich
Plot: Ice King suffers a heartbreaking loss and it's up to Finn and Jake to find the culprit.
